Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. Considering its exceptional quality and functionality, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $10500. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing me to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
